about_the_game:
A first-person point and click adventure where you take photos and solve puzzles.


Trapped without your memories but equipped with a camera you’ll explore abandoned apartments, airfields, temples, and underground facilities to search for clues, solve puzzles, and unlock secrets to answer the question; who are you?

Your head’s pounding, your body cold. The air is ripe with something all too familiar. Blood.

The odour is unmistakable. But there’s something else. Something sweet but medicinal, an intoxifying cocktail of brown sugar, ethanol, and disinfectant.

It hurts to open your eyes, the lights are bright but it’s not that. Moving hurts, like you haven’t moved in a long time.

Questions racing through your mind; where are you, how long have you been here, what the fork is that taste?

EXPLORE THE WORLD



Explore an expansive world of ancient temples, airfields, apartments, motels, bars, and more.

SOLVE PUZZLES WITH YOUR CAMERA



Take photos of everything you find, write notes on them, and use them to solve puzzles.

UNLOCK SECRETS AND ANSWER QUESTIONS


Puzzles. Puzzles everywhere. It's puzzles all the way down.

content_descriptors.notes: There is a blood stain on the floor in the starting room and some newspaper articles later about a car crash with a pregnant passenger.

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: OSX 10.7+
  • Processor: 1 GHz
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Embedded
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
mac_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: OSX 10.10+
  • Processor: 1.5 GHz
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Embedded
  • Storage: 1 GB available space

name: Another Tomorrow Demo

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 10, Windows 8, Windows 7, Vista, or XP Service Pack 3
  • Processor: 1 GHz
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Graphics: OpenGL 2.1 or higher (available in most modern Windows systems)
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: 1.5 GHz
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: OpenGL 2.1 or higher (available in most modern Windows systems)
  • Storage: 1 GB available space

short_description: Another Tomorrow is a first-person point and click game. Trapped without your memories you’ll explore abandoned apartments, airfields, temples, and underground facilities to search for clues, solve puzzles, and unlock secrets to answer the question; who are you?
